transcript.text: Happy Passover everyone and shabbat
shalom it's the 15th day of a V or the
first day of unleavened bread it's a
high Sabbath the 14th day of a V
Passover just ended and this is my
Passover meal as you can see we have the
bitter herbs some horseradish and some
parsley
you have the unleavened bread we have
the lamb a special candle that I bought
for Passover these are actually a
chocolates concoction that I know they
look like they're 11 but they're not in
fact they are this it's a special
Passover treat called chocolate
macaroons and you can see right there it
says kosher for Passover and for
year-round use but it actually does not
have any leaven in it so shabbat shalom
happy peace of unleavened bread and
Happy Passover
